article.headline: Manhattan 78, Fairfield 77
article.story: NEW YORK (AP) -- Arturo DuBois scored 17 points, including a go-ahead basket with 3:02 remaining, and Manhattan defeated Fairfield 78-77 on Thursday night. Jeff Xavier added 16 points and 12 rebounds, Jason Wingate had 14 points and Mike Konovelchick 13 for the Jaspers (17-9, 13-4 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference). Terrence Todd scored 28 points, Michael Bell 15 and DeWitt Maxwell had 13 points and 11 rebounds for Fairfield (9-17, 7-10), which has lost four of five games. DuBois, who eventually fouled out, tied the game at 73-73 with 3:46 left and then put Manhattan ahead for good. A 3-point shot to win by Fairfield's Herbie Allen was partially blocked by Devon Austin and fell short at the buzzer. There were 16 lead changes and nine ties in the game. DuBois had 12 points to help the Jaspers to a 41-38 lead at halftime. Todd scored early in the second half to give the Stags their biggest lead after the break at 47-42. The teams poured in 20 3-point shots overall, with Fairfield hitting 11-of-27 from beyond the arc and Manhattan 9-of-20. The Jaspers shot 50.0 percent for the game while holding the Stags to 38.1 percent.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
